alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 20 at 6:46PM CST until November 20 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SIMPSON...NORTHERN LAWRENCE AND NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 646 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located over Oma, or 12 miles north of Monticello, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... New Hebron and Shivers around 650 PM CST. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
